job.title: Site Reliability Engineer, VP
job.description: Job Id: 21346882<br><br>Site Reliability Engineer is a critical role that will help drive the end-to-end deliverables for the Production Resiliency work stream under the TTS strategic client experience pillar. Successful candidate will be integral to evolving traditional support organization into newly formed SRE practice<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Actively participate in architecture, design reviews and operational readiness exercises for new and existing services</li><li>Drive service reliability by developing tooling that enables scalability, resilience and automation of manual tasks.</li><li>Provide solutions and recommendations to teams working on Production Resiliency streams</li><li>Contribute to defining resiliency standards and best practices.</li><li>Develop framework for testing configuration and infrastructure changes which can be incorporated into release management process</li><li>Implement libraries that can be utilized by application development teams to ensure observability standards are followed</li><li>Perform intent driven capacity planning for new and existing services</li><li>Educate and train production support personnel on SRE principles <br></li></ul><strong><u>Key Qualifications:<br></u></strong><ul><li>7+ years of professional software engineering experience</li><li>2+ years of experience in SRE roles</li><li>Expertise analyzing complex application, database, network, and OS issues across a distributed large scale customer facing systems</li><li>Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively across multiple business and technical team</li><li>Experience in Java, .NET, Maven, Gradle, Jenkins, Helm, Puppet, Chef, Ansible, Kubernetes, AWS, Splunk, Prometheus </li><li>BS degree in
